languages.text: {n}По какой-то причине Руолдо перевел тему и не стал рассказывать больше о родной планете. Трудно сказать, почему он так поступил.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По какой-то причине Руолдо перевел тему и не стал рассказывать больше о родной планете. Трудно сказать, почему он так поступил.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, withholding any more about his native world. The reason for his choice is unclear.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, withholding any more about his native world. The reason for his choice is unclear.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ルオルドは母星のことをこれ以上話したがらず、唐突に話題を変えた。理由は不明だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドは母星のことをこれ以上話したがらず、唐突に話題を変えた。理由は不明だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo cambia de tema abruptamente, negándose a seguir hablando de su mundo natal. El motivo se te escapa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo cambia de tema abruptamente, negándose a seguir hablando de su mundo natal. El motivo se te escapa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}罗尔多突然岔开了话题，不愿多提他的故乡。至于他为什么这么做，你并不清楚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}罗尔多突然岔开了话题，不愿多提他的故乡。至于他为什么这么做，你并不清楚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo wechselt abrupt das Thema, als wolle er nicht mehr über seine Heimatwelt sagen. Der Grund dafür ist unklar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo wechselt abrupt das Thema, als wolle er nicht mehr über seine Heimatwelt sagen. Der Grund dafür ist unklar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo change soudainement de sujet, ne souhaitant pas évoquer plus avant sa planète d'origine pour une raison qui vous échappe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo change soudainement de sujet, ne souhaitant pas évoquer plus avant sa planète d'origine pour une raison qui vous échappe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yurdu hakkında daha fazla bir şey söylemek istemeyen Ruoldo, aniden konuyu değiştiriyor. Sebebini bilmiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo abruptly changes the subject, unwilling to say more about his native world. The reason for this is unclear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yurdu hakkında daha fazla bir şey söylemek istemeyen Ruoldo, aniden konuyu değiştiriyor. Sebebini bilmiyorsun.{/n}
